answers.answer: My first baby was breech and they had to stop labor in order to turn him at 36 weeks.  He turned again and then one more time before settling in.  We thought I would go early because of my contractions, but I had to be induced over a week late.  Your little one has plenty of time to turn.  I did not have diabetes, but I know they worry that babies will get big if mom has gd.  My son was over 10 lbs. when he was born, so at least 8 lbs. the first time the Dr. turned him and then at least 9 lbs. when he turned himself again.  You will be fine, they really don't care till around 36 weeks.

question: Okay I am now 29 weeks, my baby is still breech and we just found out that I have gestational diabetes, will my baby have time to turn and what are my chances of him coming early, or my doctor having to take him early?
title: breech baby??
